newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Carriage Services started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Carriage Services started.

text.p: -- Chicago Corp said Wednesday it initiated coverage of Carriage Services Inc, a funeral company, with a buy rating.

-- Chicago Corp said it projected Carriage's long-term annual earnings per share growth at 25 to 30 percent. "We believe the company can sustain this rate of earnings growth through a combination of acquisitions, margin improvement in its core operations, leverage of its existing management infrastructure and deleveraging," Chicago Corp said.
-- It projected earnings of $0.58 a share on a fully diluted basis in 1997 and $0.75 in 1998.
-- A $20 a share price target was set.
